You guys look like you are on a blind date!
You guys look like you are on a blind date!
Would you guys like to take a picture?

py: Shíyí lǎoshī shì lái chūchāi ma
en: Miss Shi Yi, are you here for work?
Xiaoyu is. I'm here to keep her company.
It'd take a while for you to visit them all.

py: Nà wǒmen dàjiā wán diǎn shénme
en: Would you guys like to play some games?

py: pūkè nǐ yòu bù huì wán
en: But you don't know how to play poker.
It's okay. I'll watch you guys play.

zh: 周生老师 你可以吗
py: Zhōu shēng lǎoshī nǐ kěyǐ ma
en: Mr. Zhousheng, do you play poker?
Then I'll go get the cards.

py: wǒ gěi nǐ pāi de dà zhǎng tuǐ

en: I may as well show you after photographing.
Let me see that one first.
Let me see that one first.
Have you visited the Giant Wild Goose Pagoda

py: Gǔ chéngqiáng zhī lèi de ma

en: We are going to visit the Ancient City Wall
but we won't go to the Giant Wild Goose Pagoda.
The Giant Wild Goose Pagoda is very beautiful.
You should go check it out.

py: Nà nǐmen zhù dé zhēn hǎo
en: Then the place you guys are staying is very nice!
That hotel is nice for sure.

py: Wǒ dàxué méi bìyè nà huì er
nà jiǔdiàn hái méi gài qǐlái
en: when I graduated from the college there.

py: Wǒ de àihào tǐng duō de
Nà nǐ zuì xǐhuān de diànshìjù

zh: 化学教授也爱看穿越哦
py: Huàxué jiàoshòu yě ài kàn chuānyuè ó
en: Even a chemistry professor likes time-travel dramas!
It's even "A Step into the Past"!

py: nǐ bù huì kàn nì ma
Nǐ bù huì kàn nì ma
Wǒ juédé hái tǐng yǒuyìsi de
Xiànzài wǒ měi chǎng xì dōu jìdé
en: And now I can remember every scene

py: Měi jù táicí yě dū jìdé
en: and every line in that show.
You've got a good hand, I think.

py: Nà wǒmen jiù qù zuò gōngjiāole
en: We'll take a bus to go back.

py: Gǎnjué tā duì nǐ yīnggāi shì

zh: 都不问你要个手机号呢
py: dōu bù wèn nǐ yào gè shǒujī hào ne
en: without even asking for your phone number?

py: zhè biān bù tài hǎo dǎ
en: It's hard to get a taxi here.
How long will it take to walk back?

py: Wǒmen màn man zǒu huíqù suànle

zh: 不行 太远了太远了
py: Wǒmen màn man zǒu huíqù suànle
Nǐmen shì qù dàyàn tǎ ma
en: Are you going to the Giant Wild Goose Pagoda?
We are going to the hotel across
from the Giant Wild Goose Pagoda.
He Shan. Do you know him?
One of you has the last name Shi,

py: Zhè nán de shìgè shèyǐng shī

zh: 有位佟老师 说是找您
py: Yǒu wèi tóng lǎoshī shuō shì zhǎo nín
en: A lady named Tong is here to see you.

zh: 那我去门口补一下登记
py: Nà wǒ qù ménkǒu bǔ yīxià dēngjì
en: Then I'll go help her fill out her particulars at the gate.

py: Zhè liǎng tiān zài xī'ān kāihuì
en: I'm having a meeting in Xi'an,

py: Shùnbiàn bǎ zhège dài gěi nǐ
en: so I dropped by to bring you this.
I hope you two have a happy life.
that you are the only one

py: Dào xiànzài wǒ hái zài yóuyù
Rúguǒ nǐ duì nǐ de hūnyīn

zh: 你未来的丈夫周文川谈
py: nǐ wèilái de zhàngfū zhōuwén chuān tán

zh: 如果 你是来送请柬的
py: Rúguǒ nǐ shì lái sòng qǐngjiǎn de
en: If you are here to bring me the invitation,
I'm just thinking about the past.
My wedding is scheduled early next month.

py: Wǒ tóngshì hái zài lóu xià
en: My colleague is still waiting for me downstairs.

py: Wǒ shì kàn tā huānxǐzhe lái
en: Well, she came with a smile

zh: 我还以为她是老师您的
py: Wǒ hái yǐwéi tā shì lǎoshī nín de

zh: 我还想时宜该怎么办呢
py: Wǒ hái xiǎng shíyí gāi zěnme bàn ne
en: And I was worried about Shi Yi...
think of Shi Yi at this moment?

py: Wǒ juédé tā duì nín de ài yì
en: I think she fell in love with you
when she first met you at the airport.

py: Nín duì tā yě bù yībān a
Nín duì tā yě bù yībān a
tóng yóu qīnglóng sì bù shuō
en: Not only did you visit the Azure Dragon Temple with her,
you even called a taxi for her.
If you don't have feelings for her,

py: Nǐ shuō nǐ yī tiāntiān de
nǎozi lǐ dōu zài xiǎng shénme
en: Is that all you think about
I...I've been thinking about the experiments.
